title: Climate Night Live at Climate Week NYC
summary: We're kicking off Climate Week NYC with an evening of connection and clean energy entertainment. Sponsor spotlight: The business case for sustainability Volts live podcast: A conversation with Michael Liebreich Climate Night Live is back! By registering for this event, your contact details may be shared with the event's sponsor(s). Contact us at sponsorships@canarymedia.com to learn more about opportunities at this event.

title: Canary Media x Volts at Climate Week NYC
summary: Join Canary Media and Volts’ David Roberts for a live double podcast with Carlos Araque of Quaise Energy and Doreen Harris of NYSERDA. Volts founder and journalist David Roberts will sit down for subsequent conversations with two leaders shaping the future of clean energy: Carlos Araque, co-founder and CEO of Quaise Energy, and Doreen Harris, president and CEO of the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA). Harris leads NYSERDA, New York’s clean energy agency, which is driving the state’s transition to renewable power. 12:30–1:30 pm: Carlos Arque, CEO of Quaise Energy, in conversation with David Roberts 2:00–2:45 pm: Doreen Harris, President & CEO of NYSERDA, in conversation with David Roberts
